snippet.title: Big Pharma Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game from www.bigpharmagame.com

Sign up to the dev newsletter here, top of right hand side bar: http://www.twicecircled.com/2c/blog/

http://www.twitter.com/twicecircled
http://www.bigpharmagame.com

Big Pharma is a tycoon, management simulation game for PC all about running your own pharmaceutical company.
